_comment: TEMPLATE: Fictional example for testing. Not a real company.
name: Robotnik's Badnik Barn (Example)
overview: Specializes in building robots that chase blue hedgehogs. 30+ years of experience being outrun.
content_html:
Overview

This is a fictional example for testing purposes.

Robotnik's Badnik Barn specializes in building robots that chase blue hedgehogs. 30+ years of experience being outrun.

Capabilities

  • Building robots that fall off cliffs
  • Designing traps that never work
  • Collecting Chaos Emeralds (unsuccessfully)
